segments.text: Sir , I've finished your shaving . Wow , it takes years off you after having a shave .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? You've done a good job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . May I suggest you to trim your eyebrows ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have never heard that men would trim their eyebrows . Are you kidding ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , sir , I am serious . Haven't you heard that today men are becoming increasingly interested in having their eyebrows professionally groomed ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you mean that it is a trend for men to trim their eyebrows ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Absolutely . Several men have tried it in my A shop . Do you want to try ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , let me have a try .
segments.speaker: S2
